channel.title: Silverscape-317 v.1 (my first server)
channel.description:
[size=18pt] this is my first server post so please don't comment badly if you don't like it but feel free to give suggestions for version 2 :|[/size] [size=36pt]Silverscape 317 version 1![/size]
[color=blue][color=yellow][size=12pt][IMG]http://i900.photobucket.com/albums/ac207/gemscape/silverscape.jpg[/img] [color=black]working spec video (not real spec though :() http://s900.photobucket.com/albums/ac207/gemscape/?action=view&current=silverscapeworkingspecs0002.mp4&newest=1[/color][IMG]http://i900.photobucket.com/albums/ac207/gemscape/silverscapeskills.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i900.photobucket.com/albums/ac207/gemscape/silverscapeshops.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i900.photobucket.com/albums/ac207/gemscape/silverscapeminigames.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i900.photobucket.com/albums/ac207/gemscape/silverscapehome.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i900.photobucket.com/albums/ac207/gemscape/silverscapegodwars.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i900.photobucket.com/albums/ac207/gemscape/silverscapepkdrops.jpg[/img] Custom item video: http://s900.photobucket.com/albums/ac207/gemscape/?action=view&current=silverscapecustom0001.mp4
Silverscape download's: password is: moparscape[/size]
Source: http://www.mediafire.com/?3ztmbg9c9x5b43q Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?c9b66ai99ukni6f
Please give me credits if you host this server, also feel free to post here if you do host this server. Thanks and remember this is the first server of mine that I hav posted.

item.title: Silverscape-317 v.1 (my first server)
item.dc:creator: @Saladfingers Saladfingers
item.description:
@Saladfingers wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:2, topic:367668”]Suggestions for next version:

  • Remove the customs
  • Spread out the shops, at least put them somewhere else
  • Spread out the skilling area, at least make people walk to the thieving for example[/quote]

Yes I agree, I do not agree with the customs. Other than that, it’s definently a good server!

Read full topic
